import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; function Sidebar() { const location = useLocation(); const [showDropdown, setShowDropdown] = useState(false); const toggleDropdown = () => setShowDropdown(!showDropdown); // Fungsi bantu untuk cek menu aktif const isActive = (path) => location.pathname.startsWith(path); return (

{showDropdown && (

)} Pengumuman Laporan Pengaturan Sistem

); } export default Sidebar;
